body.name: Liquidless Laundry Detergent Sheets 180 Sheets, Compact Laundry Sheets Great for Travel, Dorm, Home NEW
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 9 hrs 38 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: [Effective Cleaning] Our laundry detergent sheets feature a high-concentrated formula with plant extracts, surfactants, and biological decomposing enzymes that help remove dirt and various stains from your clothes, such as oil, coffee, and red wine stains.

[Eco-Friendly] Our laundry detergent strips are biodegradable and friendly to the environment. Unlike traditional liquid laundry detergent that comes in plastic jugs, our detergent strips are packaged in a way that minimizes pollution and waste.

[Easy to Use] Using our washer sheets is a breeze. Simply put the sheets into the washing machine according to the number of clothes and start washing. Enjoy the ease and simplicity of our laundry sheets.
[Gentle Formula] Our laundry sheets are made without harsh ingredients that can potentially trigger skin irritation or discomforting rashes.

[After-sales Service] We are committed to providing our customers with high-quality after-sales service. If you are not satisfied with our travel detergent sheets, please feel free to contact us. We are always here for you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Laundry Detergent Sheets Botanical Ingredient Recyclable Package Convenience Lightweight &Compact Botanical Ingredient Recyclable Package Convenience Lightweight &Compact Botanical Ingredient Recyclable Package Convenience Lightweight &Compact

Crafted with a concentrated formula, packing a greater cleaning power into a compact piece. Despite their small size, they effectively removing stains and dirt from clothes, compatibility with all types of washing machines, including high-efficiency washers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Efficient clean, dissolves well
reviews.reviewText: Galitoon laundry detergent sheets did a respectably efficient job of cleaning.SHEET DISSOLVABILITY:I used two sheets for a large load, per instructions, in cool water.There were very little temporary suds, which is normal for natural surfactants. More suds do not mean more cleaning power with natural surfactants. I placed clothes in washer, placing the 2 sheets on top of a dark colored item, directly under the water source to see if they would melt as expected. There was NO problem with sheets dissolving. There was no sheet residue on either the clothes, or the machine sides.CLEANING: As an extra test, I included in this load a couple greasy spotted pot holders. Both of them came out clean, with no sticky residue from remaining grease, so it seems they washed up beautifully.SCENT: The sheets have a lovely light scent which does not overpower, and is not present when clothes are removed from dryer.Overall, I am convinced you may use these sheets with confidence. I am pleased with my results, and would purchase again.I hope my comments help you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well in cold water
reviews.reviewText: I bought these because I like the idea of eliminating the large plastic bottles used for liquid detergents. I was concerned that the detergent “sheets” may not dissolve in cold water. I was delighted to find they fully dissolve in cold water and clothes come out clean and fresh. I’m satisfied and will order again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not a bad deterrent for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So this are pretty decent they work well the dissolve pretty good i have a front load washer so i put them in the washer its self and its worked fine but i also tried it in the dispenser and it dissolved good to i just prefer to throw them in with the clothes they smell good also but don’t touch with wet hands the sheets are very sensitive

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They smell delicious and eco friendly!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The laundry detergent sheets are a great purchase and discovery.The scent is delicious, and my clothes smell very good for a long time, plus they clean pretty well my clothing, even the whites.They dissolve easily and are eco friendly.Perfect for traveling, I don't have to carry the whole jug with me anymore.And the best part is the price, less than $10 for plenty of product for a long time and this makes my husband happy lol.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets the laundry clean!
reviews.reviewText: A more environmental way of washing clothes minus the plastic tub disaster to the environment! Great smell and value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more heavy laundry detergent!!!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love these so much!!! I did big loads of laundry so I used 2 sheets per load and my clothes came out very clean and fresh smelling. I just popped 2 wash sheets in then my clothes!! I definitely will be getting more of these and some for my parents they are older and have a hard time carrying heavy laundry detergent. I highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars These seems to work well
reviews.reviewText: I like these sheets. They're easy to use and seem to do a pretty good job. I've been trying a lot of laundry sheets, and some of them are hit or miss, but these seem to be a hit. It also helps that they're so easy to use, my kids can't make a mess of them.
